"May I follow you?"asked politely Shivah


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::KitKat2/StarScream/DrillBit::
> 
> StarScream gets up.
> "I'm gonna go geta  drink. If there is to be a battle, I'm going to 
get
> drunk first." He chuckled at his lame joke. He headed out and down 
the
> hall.
> 
> KitKat2 turns to him.
> "I'll join you." She turned to SilverScout.
> "If you'll excuse me." She then turned to DrillBit.
> "C'ya in a bit darling." 
> 
> The both walked to the Mess Hall. As they entered, KitKat2 
accidently
> bumbed into Incarcinator, as they went to the replicators.
> 
> Back at the meeting room, DrillBit decided him and Killfest need to 
go
> and discuss plans. 
> "Killfest, lets walk and discuss our options." He walks out and 
down the
> hall.
